AbMeTxtP1: Hi! My name is Marcel - I am a Frontend-Developer based in Gevelsberg, Germany.
AbMeTxtP2: I help companies and designers to bring their ideas to real life. Solution orientation, analytical thinking and creativity are skills that I have developed to connect ideas into quality products.
AbMeTxtP3: I am currently rounding off my skills in web development by also completing my backend training to become a Fullstack-Developer.
AbMeTxtP4: If you think I would be a good match for your company or projects, contact me!
